segments.text: Almost ready . Could you set the table ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll have fruit salad to start and then the roast beef .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll have my beef well-done , please . By the way , don't we have soup tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't prepare it , but if you want , I can cook some . What soup would you like to have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Well , I'd like onion soup . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
